name: MoonPay
slogan: The new standard for fiat to crypto
description:
MoonPay is the new standard for fiat to crypto. We are a marketplace between cryptocurrency exchanges and users facilitating instant non-custodial purchases of major cryptocurrencies. 

Our mission is to make crypto accessible to everyone. Founded in 2018, MoonPay is working with leading crypto companies to solve the fiat-to-crypto onramp challenge. 

We offer best-in-class developer tools, including a customizable widget and public APIs, to enable crypto companies to build seamless purchase experiences. MoonPay currently operates in over 36 countries and offers 24/7 customer support.

team.title: CTO
team.name: Victor Faramond
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CTO @MoonPay

team.title: CEO
team.name: Ivan Soto-Wright
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CEO @MoonPay, GP @HODL.vc

team.title: Head of Business Development
team.name: Halsey Huth
team.bioHtml: Head of BD @MoonPay | Investing in early stage Blockchain and fintech projects @HODL.vc Ex VC @Seedcamp, @Concrete VC. Innovation Consultant @TechDotX

jobs.title: Business Operations Analyst (Intern)
jobs.description:
# What we're looking for
**MoonPay** is a rapidly growing fintech startup with a global decentralized team building the future of payments and financial services. We believe fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies should be two parts of one interconnected and open financial ecosystem, and we‚Äôre building the mission-critical developer tools to make this a reality.

You will not find another opportunity like this anywhere. MoonPay has just started to undergo exponential growth and the team is rapidly expanding as it scales to become a globally ambitious company. We need driven people to help us manage our growing list of clients and help us in our mission.

This is not a normal BD role. You won't be doing cold calls‚Äîwe have a full pipeline of prospective clients ready to go. If you want to be part of the next stage of our growth  and have front-line exposure to the startup space, then this is the perfect role for you. 

That said, this role is not for everyone. We want people that are willing to work hard: hustlers, hackers, and people that can consistently execute. While we are calling this an internship, the role will turn into a full-time position for the right candidate. For recent graduates this will transition into a full-time role, and for rising seniors we will offer a full-time position once you graduate.

# Responsibilities
- Work directly with the CEO and Head of Business Development to grow the business
- Target new clients and strategize on how to land them - data drives our BD process
- Responsible for keeping client pipeline and documentation current
- Assist clients through the onboarding process
- Engage with special projects and client launches
- Create client reports and dashboards using SQL

# Qualifications
- Recent Graduate or rising senior
- Experience as an analyst, consultant, or business development representative
- Data analytics and SQL experience preferred
- Deep expertise in the blockchain industry not needed, but will give you a leg up
- Ability to grow your own network and build relationships
- Desire to learn and grow


# Benefits
- Remote-first work culture - we let you work where and how you work best. Unlimited holidays within reason and flexible about time off if you're not feeling well. 
- Autonomy - we are not going to micromanage you, we will always be there to guide, train, and support.  .
- We care about our people. All MoonPay employees are valued and taken care of even during times of hardship.


# About Us
**MoonPay** is the new standard for fiat to crypto. We are a marketplace between cryptocurrency exchanges and users facilitating instant non-custodial purchases of major cryptocurrencies. Our mission is to make crypto accessible to everyone. Founded in 2018, MoonPay is working with leading crypto companies to solve the fiat-to-crypto onramp challenge. We offer best-in-class developer tools, including a customizable widget and public APIs, to enable crypto companies to build seamless purchase experiences. MoonPay currently services customers in 60+ countries around the world across Europe, Asia, North and South America.

# How to Apply
Please send your resume and a short intro on why this is a good fit to halsey@moonpay.io

How to Apply

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
## THE ROLE

- Develop new products and features, improve existing products and features
- Expand your development experience across the stack and other platforms
- Contribute in the product process: thinking through UX, designing beautiful UI, and working with customers to solve their problems
- Develop and utilize your skills as a mentor and leader
- Help estimate, plan and execute on projects, features, and integrations
- Champion code quality, new technologies, and architectural design within the company
- Technologies we use: Typescript, NodeJS, GraphQL, React, Postgres, Heroku, AWS

## REQUIREMENTS

- Experience in developing, releasing, and maintaining web applications under pressure.
- Full-stack development experience (both frontend and backend).
- Familiarity with popular JS frameworks and web technologies overall (NodeJS, React/Redux, GraphQL, etc...)
- Deep understanding of database structures, theories, principles, and best practices (PostgreSQL).

## NICE TO HAVE

- Contribution to open-source software.
- Hard skills in application deployment (AWS, Google Cloud, Docker, etc.) and version control (Git).
- Love to hack on weekend projects.
- Experience in payments or fintech.

## BENEFITS

- Competitive salary, based on experience.
- A fulfilling, challenging work experience. üí™üèº
- Ample time off and flexible/remote working options.

## STILL HERE?

You have to be really motivated! üòÅ

Just apply through AngelList, and a team member will be in touch & see whether it might be a mutual fit.

jobs.title: Head of Customer Success
jobs.description:
# What we're looking for
**MoonPay** is a rapidly growing fintech startup with a global decentralized team building the future of payments and financial services. We believe fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies should be two parts of one interconnected and open financial ecosystem, and we‚Äôre building the mission-critical developer tools to make this a reality.

You will not find another opportunity like this anywhere. MoonPay has just started to undergo exponential growth and the team is rapidly expanding as it scales to become a globally ambitious company. We need driven people to help us manage our growing list of clients and help us in our mission.

# Responsibilities
- Oversee MoonPay's overall customer support strategy
- Grow and manage a team of customer support analysts
- Iterate and improve our current customer success operations

# Qualifications
- 3-5 Years + experience working in high-performance culture in financial technology industry
- Previous experience dealing with fraud and payments highly preferred
- Undergraduate or MBA degree

# Benefits
- Remote-first work culture - we let you work where and how you work best. Unlimited holidays within reason and flexible about time off if you're not feeling well. 
- Autonomy - we are not going to micromanage you, we will always be there to guide, train, and support.  .
- We care about our people. All MoonPay employees are valued and taken care of even during times of hardship.


# About Us
**MoonPay** is the new standard for fiat to crypto. We are a marketplace between cryptocurrency exchanges and users facilitating instant non-custodial purchases of major cryptocurrencies. Our mission is to make crypto accessible to everyone. Founded in 2018, MoonPay is working with leading crypto companies to solve the fiat-to-crypto onramp challenge. We offer best-in-class developer tools, including a customizable widget and public APIs, to enable crypto companies to build seamless purchase experiences. MoonPay currently services customers in 60+ countries around the world across Europe, Asia, North and South America.

# How to Apply
Please send your resume and a short intro on why this is a good fit to ivan@moonpay.io

jobs.title: Senior Security Engineer
jobs.description:
**MoonPay** is a rapidly growing financial technology company building developer tools for fiat-to-crypto connectivity. 

We are hiring a talented **Security Engineer** to join our globally distributed team.

**THE ROLE**
* Analyze security systems and seek improvements on a continuous basis
* Identify and report potential threats
* Research vulnerabilities and find ways to mitigate them
* Develop best practices and security standards & policies for the organization
* Test, implement and improve/maintain security systems and controls
* Engineer, implement and monitor security systems and controls
* Identify and define system security requirements
* Design computer security architecture and develop detailed security designs
* Prepare and document standard operating procedures and playbooks
* Configure and troubleshoot security infrastructure devices
* Develop technical solutions and new security tools to help mitigate security vulnerabilities and automate repeatable tasks
* Respond to and lead security incident response
* Write comprehensive reports including assessment-based findings, outcomes and propositions for further system security enhancement

**REQUIREMENTS**
* Ability to prioritize projects
* Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment
* Excellent communication skills
* Certifications such as CISSP, GSEC, CEH or CISM desired
* An understanding of security best practices and how to implement them
* At least 4 years experience in the cybersecurity field
* Critical thinking skills and the ability to solve problems as they arise
* Work experience as a security engineer
* Experience in building and maintaining security systems
* Hands on experience in security systems, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, anti-virus software, authentication systems, log management, content filtering, etc

**NICE-TO-HAVES**
* Experience with some of the technologies we use such as Typescript, NodeJS, GraphQL, React, Postgres, Heroku, AWS

**BENEFITS**
* Competitive salary and equity, based on experience 
* A fulfilling and challenging work experience. 
* Ample time off and flexible/remote working
